Title: Availability and Demand of Jobs from the Perception of Automated Recruitment in Oman
Abstract: natural language processing has been applied for automation of the recruitment process globally with the increase in volumes of profiles and jobs. this paper discusses certain challenges in the use of cutting edge technologies for documents in the arabic language. we analyze the availability and demand of jobs in oman with reference to that in uae. as a result hurdles can be minimized in the job resume matching process between the employers and prospective candidates.
